name: narduk-games
description: A monorepo for all Narduk games

scripts.lexi-stack:build:subdir: cd games/lexi-stack && VITE_BASE_PATH=/lexistack/ npm run build
scripts.wordle-clone:build:subdir: cd games/wordle-clone && VITE_BASE_PATH=/wordle/ npm run build
scripts.stack-balance:build:subdir: cd games/stack-balance && VITE_BASE_PATH=/stack-balance/ npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run install:lexi-stack && npm run install:wordle-clone && npm run install:stack-balance && npm run install:tapweave
scripts.build:all: npm run lexi-stack:build && npm run wordle-clone:build && npm run stack-balance:build && npm run tapweave:build
scripts.build:all:subdir: npm run lexi-stack:build:subdir && npm run wordle-clone:build:subdir && npm run stack-balance:build:subdir
scripts.test:all: npm run lexi-stack:test && npm run wordle-clone:test && npm run stack-balance:test && npm run tapweave:test

author: loganrenz
